ability.Symbiotic Control: Increases the power of draining moves by 25%.
ability.Bloodening Surge: This Pokemon's each drain recharges itself once. After reaching 5, it will enter Bloodening condition, its attack and special attack is increased by 50%.

Bloodblight Strike.effect: Drains 1/8 of the target's max HP and gains additional one rechage.

Dragon Breath.effect: Has a 20% chance to paralyze the target.

Quirio Beam.effect: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target.
